name: Holcombe
address: 13 Bolton Rd W, Ramsbottom, Bury BL0 9NA
about: Holcombe Tap is a busy family run bar and kitchen. With a really friendly atmosphere and a newly refurbished interior it's the perfect place for a bite to eat or a casual drink with friends.

name: Tre Ciccio
about: The name Tre Ciccio translates as ‘three chubby friends’. Tre Ciccio is a purveyor of traditional Italian neapolitan pizza and roast chicken.

name: The Lounge
address: 2-4 Prince Street, Ramsbottom, United Kingdom, BL0 9FN
about: The Lounge is an independant family run restaurant and cafe bar situated in the centre of the beautiful market town of Ramsbottom, offering an extensive fresh menu which is complimented by our regularly changing specials board.
